system.descriptor: Knowledge that is deliberately hidden or suppressed about a certain group. Possession of this knowledge may cause difficulties, but reveals meany hidden truths.
system.uses:
Use: Recall relevent forbidden information for relevent group. Used for seeking info on a cult, learning the dangers the Inquistion Poses, the nature of a strange set of Monoliths, information on Traitor Legions, etc.
Skill Groups: Mechanicus, Astartes, Codex Astartes, Archeotech, Black Library, Cults, Daemonology, Heresy, The Horus Heresy and Long War, Inquisition, Inquisitorial Ordos, Mutants, Navigators, Pirates, Psykers, The Warp, Webway, Xenos.

description.value: Knowledge that is deliberately hidden or suppressed about a certain group. Possession of this knowledge may cause difficulties, but reveals meany hidden truths.

specializations: The Horus Heresy and Long War
